ygData.subject: LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello. I am sure many of you other shadow knights have thought of this but we must take action about this subject: Shadow Knights NEED invisibility at earlier
ygData.messageBody:
Hello. I am sure many of you other shadow knights
have thought of this but we must take action about
this subject: Shadow Knights NEED invisibility at
earlier levels. They DO get the spell but at level
30. I think they should get it at level 22 because of
two main reasons. 1) We are hybrids so we already have
some EXP penalties and we can't get to three quarters
of the hunting grounds so are forced to hunt in the
area around our home city until level 30. 2) At level
2 we get the spells that necro's get at levek 8 EXCEPT
for the invisibility spell. All of us Shadow Knights
should join in and petition for invisibility at level
22! We can get them to change it. Feel free to drop me
a line if you are on fenin ro

Fizal, Fenin Ro
